data.text: @catsandcoffeecc Tylenol and Alieve are definitely helping! And lots of water. Great advice!
@jaimedrayer I had a side effects from Pfizer 2. Nothing major and it only lasted 36 ish hours luckily. Just achy and fatigued, some chills. Advil and water helped!!
@jaimedrayer And it's so worth it, isn't it? ❤️
@jaimedrayer And a quick recovery to you!
@suereformer Definitely worth it! Replace couch with bed and that’s me too. At least it’s a perfect day for it ⛈ Glad you’re ok now!
@blackbird_photo Advil for the win!! I’m feeling like your husband and bro 🤒 Definitely worth it though! Glad you’re ok ❤️

@jaimedrayer Aside from a v heavy cycle, and sore arm nothing really for vax 2. Hubs on the other hand felt like crap, fever, chills, headache. Same with my brother. But now that I think about it, I took an advil for the cramps, could have masked the other side effects.

@jaimedrayer I had Pfizer for second dose and it kicked my arse! Arm was sore the day I got it and woke up the next day and spent most of the day on the couch. Chills and fever. But next day all was good. Worth the pain.
